subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[draw]] [[back]]; to [[fold]] back
# to [[collect]]
# 35th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "[[gathering]]" ([[𝌨]])
